backlog.description: Task management: create, update, search tasks with kanban board integration. Required for all /flow:* workflows.

github.description: GitHub API: repos, issues, PRs, code search, workflows. Required for /flow:submit-n-watch-pr.

serena.description: LSP-grade code understanding & safe semantic edits. Required for /flow:implement, /flow:validate.

playwright-test.description: Browser automation for E2E testing. Recommended for /flow:validate, /qa:test.

trivy.description: Container/IaC security scans and SBOM generation. Recommended for /sec:* commands.

semgrep.description: SAST code scanning for security vulnerabilities. Recommended for /sec:* commands.

shadcn-ui.description: shadcn/ui component library access and installation. Optional for React/Next.js projects.

chrome-devtools.description: Chrome DevTools Protocol for browser inspection, performance analysis. Optional for frontend development.

mcpServers._comment_python: === PYTHON PROJECT SERVERS (Add if Python detected) ===

flowspec-security.description: Flowspec Security Scanner: scan, triage, and fix security findings. Add for Python projects.

notes: REQUIRED servers are needed for core flowspec functionality
RECOMMENDED servers enhance agent capabilities but are not required
OPTIONAL servers are useful for specific use cases (UI development)
flowspec-security is only needed for Python projects
MCP servers are installed automatically on first use via npx/uvx
missing_mcps: DAST (Dynamic Application Security Testing): Use OWASP ZAP directly
Binary Signing: Use cosign/sigstore CLI tools directly
IAST (Interactive Application Security Testing): No MCP server available
